tuv.seg: Consumers who borrow money are protected by legislation
Nuair atá tomaltóirí ag fáil airgid ar iasacht, tugann an reachtaíocht cosaint orthu
Information on types of credit, getting the right loan for your needs and your right to privacy as a financial consumer
Tugtar comhairle do dhaoine an iasacht cheart a oirfidh dá riachtanais a fháil agus tabharfar comhairle ann breathnú i gcúpla áit sula bhfaigheann duine iasacht
This document is in: Money and Tax > Personal finance > Loans and credit
This document is in: Airgead agus Cáin > Airgeadas pearsanta > Iasachtaí agus creidmheas
There are detailed rules governing the advertising of financial services and credit
Tá rialacha mionsonraithe ann lena rialaítear fógraíocht na seirbhísí agus na creidmheasa airgeadais
The Central Bank of Ireland monitors compliance with these rules
Is é Banc Ceannais na hÉireann a dhéanann monatóireacht ar chomhlíonadh na rialacha sin
This document is in: Money and Tax > Personal finance > Loans and credit
This document is in: Airgead agus Cáin > Airgeadas pearsanta > Iasachtaí agus creidmheas
This document describes the law concerning hire purchase agreements
Tá cur síos sa doiciméad seo ar an dlí a bhaineann le comhaontaithe fruilcheannaigh
This document is in: Money and Tax > Personal finance > Loans and credit
This document is in: Airgead agus Cáin > Airgeadas pearsanta > Iasachtaí agus creidmheas
Moneylending is the practice of giving cash loans or supplying goods or services that are repaid at a high level of interest over a short period of time
Is é iasachtú airgid an cleachtas ina dtugtar iasachtaí airgid thirim nó ina soláthraítear earraí nó seirbhísí a aisíoctar ar ardleibhéal úis thar thréimhse ghearr ama
Information about how moneylending is regulated and the rules that apply
Faisnéis faoi conas a rialaítear iasachtú airgid agus na rialacha a bhaineann leis
This document is in: Money and Tax > Personal finance > Loans and credit
This document is in: Airgead agus Cáin > Airgeadas pearsanta > Iasachtaí agus creidmheas
Money Advice and Budgeting Service
An tSeirbhís Buiséadaithe agus Comhairle Airgid
The Money Advice and Budgeting Service is a free, confidential service for people who have problems with money management and debt
Is seirbhís saor in aisce agus faoi rún í an tSeirbhís Buiséadaithe agus Comhairle Airgid (SBCA) le haghaidh daoine a bhfuil fadhbanna fiachais acu
This document is in: Money and Tax > Personal finance > Debt
